Apple_Valley.Lakeville Cedar (MVTA station): The Lakeville Cedar Station is a park and ride bus station along Cedar Avenue/County Road 23 in Lakeville, Minnesota. It was originally planned as the southernmost station on the METRO Red Line bus rapid transit service when that line opened in 2013, but service is now planned to begin at Lakeville Cedar at a later date. Limited express bus service (Minnesota Valley Transit Authority route 477) began operating at the site on September 28, 2009.
